text: 9:50 Matyu 5:13; Luk 14:34-35; Rom 12:18; Efesus 4:29; Kolosi 4:6; Hibru 12:14Amangsɨzim a dera, egh a uan isɨngtɨzim ateghtɨ, ia manmaghɨn a damightɨ a ua sɨngigham? Ia amangsɨzim inigh uari darɨgh, egh uari ko navir amɨrizimɨn ikɨ.”9:49-50 Ves 49 ko 50ɨn mɨgɨrɨgɨar avɨriba aningɨn aven iti. Ezɨma Grighɨn akam deragha dar akar mɨngarim abɨghizir puvatɨ. Ezɨ mɨgɨrɨgɨar kam fofozir gumaziba uaghan nɨghnɨzir vamɨram an itir puvatɨ.
